name: workers-for-platforms-template
description: A template for building website hosting platforms using Cloudflare Workers for Platforms. Deploy static sites and custom Workers code through a simple web interface.

CLOUDFLARE_API_KEY.description: Your Cloudflare Global API Key. Find it at [dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens](https://dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens) under 'Global API Key'.

CLOUDFLARE_API_EMAIL.description: The email address associated with your Cloudflare account.

CUSTOM_DOMAIN.description: Your root domain for hosting sites (e.g., `yourdomain.com`). Leave empty to use workers.dev subdomain only.

CLOUDFLARE_ZONE_ID.description: The Zone ID for your custom domain. Find it in the Cloudflare dashboard under your domain's **Overview** page in the right sidebar.

FALLBACK_ORIGIN.description: The hostname where user CNAMEs should point (e.g., `proxy.yourdomain.com`). Required for custom domain support.
